gist.headline: Telegram gets a new brain
gist.blurb: Meet EcubzBOT, a new inline AI assistant that brings answers directly into your Telegram chats.
gist.summary: Added EcubzBOT, a Telegram inline AI assistant, to the community apps showcase.
gist.impact: Users can now generate AI responses directly within their Telegram conversations using this new community tool.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee interacting with a friendly robot cube (Ecubz) and a pixelated blue paper plane (Telegram symbol).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot chatting with a friendly blue robot cube holding a paper plane. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel blue gradient background. Floating pixel chat bubbles. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'CHAT BOT'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
